name: employee-tracker
description: This is a interface or Content management system that allows non-developers to view and interact with information stored in databases. It is a command-line application that manages a company's employee database using Node.js, Inquirer, and MySQL. It allows the user to "View all departments", "View all roles","View all employees", "Add a department", "Add a role", "Add an employee", "Update an employee manager","View employees by department",'View employees by manager',  "Update an employee role", "Delete an employee", or  "View department's utilized budget".
